EmailTemplate.subject: Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Inquiry
Thank you for giving us the opportunity to address your inquiry.
Please accept this message as confirmation that your email has been received and you should expect a reply within two business days.
Have a great day!
The Customer Relations Team
************************************************************************
Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions | Contact Us
This is a system email account, and unfortunately, replies to this email cannot be acknowledged. If you have any questions or comments please follow this Contact Us link.
At Honda, we hold your personal information in strictest confidence, in accordance with federal and provincial guidelines. For further details on Honda's Customer Privacy Policy, please visit our Privacy Policy.
You are receiving this email because you have asked us to notify you about Honda products and promotions. You are subscribed as [% member:email %]. To unsubscribe, please follow this Unsubscribe link.

All information contained herein applies to Canadian products only.
